Containers.Name: eap-controller
Containers.Description: TP-LINK's free EAP Controller Software allows users to easily manage hundreds of TP-LINK EAPs in multiple sites with the controller in a single location.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where eap-controller will store it's configuration files, database and logs.[br]
Containers.Overview: TP-LINK's free EAP Controller Software allows users to easily manage hundreds of TP-LINK EAPs in multiple sites with the controller in a single location.
